author: Will Jones
description:
Labour Minister Darren Jones, the Chief Secretary to the Treasury, falsely claimed on BBC Question Time last night that most small boat migrants are women and children. The BBC failed to provide a factual correction.

The post Watch: Labour Minister Makes False Claim on BBC Question Time That Most Small Boat Migrants are Women and Children – With No Correction From BBC appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Watch: Labour Minister Makes False Claim on BBC Question Time That Most Small Boat Migrants are Women and Children – With No Correction From BBC

author: Will Jones
description:
The long shadow war between Iran and Israel broke into the open this morning with the launch of Operation Rising Lion, targeting Iran's nuclear facilities and high command. It's a war that is only just beginning.

The post Israel and Iran Are Now at War appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Israel and Iran Are Now at War

author: Anonymous Civil Servant
description:
In the Civil Service, dissent from DEI dogma is not allowed. Writing for the Daily Sceptic, an ex-civil servant says he was subject to disciplinary action just for protesting against Sadiq Khan before he even got the job.

The post As a Civil Servant, I Can Tell You Dissent From DEI Dogma is Not Allowed appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: As a Civil Servant, I Can Tell You Dissent From DEI Dogma is Not Allowed

author: Will Jones
description:
The Equality Act has fuelled a massive rise in racial discrimination tribunals, a report from Don't Divide Us has found, as the group says the act has "achieved the exact opposite of its aim" and calls for its repeal.

The post Equality Act Fuels Massive Rise in Race Discrimination Cases appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Equality Act Fuels Massive Rise in Race Discrimination Cases

author: Charlotte Gill
description:
Woke waste was bad under the Tories, but it's got even worse under Labour, says Charlotte Gill. Check out the millions being flushed down the drain on these pointless 'arts and humanities research projects'.

The post Woke Waste Has Become Even Worse Under Labour appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Woke Waste Has Become Even Worse Under Labour

author: Richard Eldred
description:
In Episode 40 of the Sceptic: Rob Bates on how to stop Britain becoming majority-minority, Tilak Doshi on Trump vs the Green Blob and Mario Trabucco on George Osborne’s Elgin Marbles betrayal.

The post The Sceptic | Episode 40: Rob Bates on Stopping Britain Becoming Majority-Minority, Tilak Doshi on Trump vs Green Blob and Mario Trabucco on Osborne’s Elgin Marbles Betrayal appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Sceptic | Episode 40: Rob Bates on Stopping Britain Becoming Majority-Minority, Tilak Doshi on Trump vs Green Blob and Mario Trabucco on Osborne’s Elgin Marbles Betrayal

author: Richard Eldred
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
